sentence.Network_en: He has submitted a bid to resuscitate the struggling magazine.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经投标来拯救这个岌岌可危的周刊。

sentence.Network_en: He had a heart attack and all attempts to resuscitate him failed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的心脏病发作，所有抢救他的努力都失败了。

sentence.Network_en: A policeman and then a paramedic tried to resuscitate her.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名警察和一位护理人员先后试图救活她。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from Latin resuscitat- 'raised again', from the verb resuscitare, from re- 'back' + suscitare 'raise'

entry.def: If you resuscitate someone who has stopped breathing, you cause them to start breathing again.

example.ex: A policeman and then a paramedic tried to resuscitate her.
example.tran: 一名警察和一位护理人员先后试图救活她。

entry.def: If you resuscitate something, you cause it to become active or successful again.

example.ex: He has submitted a bid to resuscitate the struggling magazine.
example.tran: 他已经投标来拯救这个岌岌可危的周刊。

sentences.sentence: "She revived after the doctor gave her an injection"

auth_sentence.content: No one has been able to resuscitate a corpse.
auth_sentence.res_content: No one has been able to resuscitate a corpse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No one has been able to resuscitate a corpse.

auth_sentence.content: It took twenty minutes to resuscitate him by mouth-to-mouth.
auth_sentence.res_content: It took twenty minutes to resuscitate him by mouth-to-mouth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It took twenty minutes to resuscitate him by mouth-to-mouth.

auth_sentence.res_content: Appin said guards tried without success to resuscitate him.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =quote,call, 表示"引用,唤起"; 2. =citizen,表示"公民"

stems_affixes.word_buile: excite[v.使兴奋,刺激]+ant表形容词→adj.使兴奋的
cit引用,唤起+ation表名词→n.引用,引证
excite[v.使兴奋,刺激]+ment表名词→n.兴奋

stems_affixes.value_cn: 城市, 都市, 全体居民, 城邦

stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+cit引用,唤起+e→引进[精神]→鼓励
re再+cit引用,唤起+e→再[把记的东西]引出
re再+sus下面+cit引用,唤起+ate表动词→把下去的东西再引出→恢复;激活

means.word_mean: 使(某人或某物)恢复知觉,苏醒

sentences.en: to resuscitate a person who has been nearly drowned
sentences.cn: 使已将近淹死的人复生

sentences.en: The doctor resuscitated the man who was overcome by gas.
sentences.cn: 医生救活了那个煤气中毒的人。
